name: Space Reign
description:
Represent one of the space corporations in the near future as they fight for control over the crucial supply of deep space natural resources. Engage in ship to ship combat, take on different missions, explore and exploit sectors with dynamic traffic.





Start with a single, smaller-sized ship, complete various contracts for other factions, earn credits and increase your standing, then slowly raise your influence in different sectors and claim them for yourself one by one.



Buy new ships and customize their loadout weapon by weapon, creating a flexible fleet fitting multiple roles based on your needs, or commit your fleet to a specific task and playstyle.



Together with manually controlling your ships, issue orders from a RTS-like tactical overview to quickly react to a dynamic sector environment and its ever-present dangers.



Directly control any of the ships in your fleet, switch between them anytime even during combat and make sure to maximise their potential.

Additional Features:
  • Conventional Weapons
  • Modular Damage
  • Contract System
  • Dynamic Sector traffic
  • Detection Mechanics
